name: Huawei EMUI Theme
summary: An HWT file is a theme used to customize the appearance of Huawei Emotion UI (EMUI), a custom Android user interface installed on Huawei smartphones. It contains icons, fonts, and images that comprise a theme. Users often download custom HWT files from third-party sources.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

android.display_name: Rename .hwt to .zip ; open as ZIP file

windows.display_name: Rename .hwt to .zip ; open as ZIP file
